name: Oops Loops (Samshine Games)
description:
Sir Woodloop wakes up only to find out he is stuck in a loop. Literally. He embarks on a dangerous adventure in search of a magical tool to free himself from the loop.

Created in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47: "Stuck in a loop".

Controls
Move - W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys
Interact, talk, look closer - E or Left mouse button

Tools Used

  • Unity
  • VEGAS Pro 15
  • GIMP
  • Stop Motion Studio
  • FFmpeg
  • My phone camera, camcorder and stuff found around the apartment
